# Lightning Flash

## Quick Facts
- Element/Type: Lightning Release
- Classification: Ninjutsu, Chakra Flow, Shurikenjutsu
- Class: Offensive
- Range: Short, Mid, Long
- Users: Sarada Uchiha, Sasuke Uchiha
- Media: Anime, Manga, Game

## Summary
The user launches a lightning-infused fÅ«ma shuriken at their opponent, knocking them back. The lightning trail it leaves behind is also capable of temporarily stunning their opponents.

## Notes
- This attack can also be used mid-air, albeit at a shorter range.
